description: Designed for those that like to rip, the Impulse is our high-end freeride glove built with our athlete team in mind. Featuring a GORE-TEX® insert and PrimaLoft® Gold Cross Core insulation, the Impulse Gloves will keep you warm during storm laps and deep days without sacrificing dexterity and supple feel thanks to a durable goat leather construction with reinforced patches in high-wear areas. EVA padding on the back of hand and thumb add protection and our sleek and warm neoprene cuff wraps it up for a snug fit when charging.
name: Impulse Gloves - Womens
